sentences.en: At other times, the watcher will dictate what to do to the driver.
sentences.cn: 反之, 观察者可以指示操作者该如何做.

sentences.en: But not every stock watcher thinks the company is a smart buy.
sentences.cn: 但并不是所有股票观察家都认为买入该公司是笔划算的买卖.

sentences.en: His boss told him to work hard and not be clock watcher.
sentences.cn: 老板告诉他要好好干活,不要老是看钟表等下班.

sentences.en: It implies a complete absence of the watcher.
sentences.cn: 它隐含的意思是:观察者完全缺席.

sentences.en: Net Watcher automatically updates the window every 20 seconds.
sentences.cn: 网络“监视员”每隔20秒自动地更新窗口.

sentences.en: Royal-watcher Mary Hayes said: "It looks like it is going to be an unhappy time for the Queen."
sentences.cn: 皇室观察员玛丽·海斯说：“看来女王接下来的日子不太好过。”

sentences.en: Safety watcher can not enter confined space.
sentences.cn: 安全监护人不得进入密闭空间.

sentences.en: Teddy: Well you know he's a keen bird watcher do not you ?
sentences.cn: 泰迪: 他热中观察野鸟,这是你知道的 吧 ?

sentences.en: That knower, that particular watcher - the witness is your true self.
sentences.cn: 这个被认知的对象, 细致地观察着 —— 这个目击者正是你真正的自己.

sentences.en: The pitcher pitches, the catcher catches and watcher watches.
sentences.cn: 投手投, 俘获器捉住和看守人手表.

sentences.en: The ruddy morning stole up the horizon, casting a crimson glow into the watcher's room.
sentences.cn: 赤色的朝阳偷偷地爬上了地平线, 一片红光射进了守望人的房间里.

sentences.en: They just hired a shark watcher to avoid sudden death.
sentences.cn: 他们雇了一位行家来避免暴死.

sentences.en: We've heard you're a big Seinfeld watcher . Any favorite episodes or characters?
sentences.cn: 问:听说你特喜欢看《宋飞传》(0年代的一部情景喜剧)有什么喜欢的章节或者角色 吗 ?

sentences.en: You are simply the watcher, and the watcher is outside the mind.
sentences.cn: 你只是观照者, 而观照者是在头脑之外的.

words.tran_cn: 看门狗；监察人；忠实的看守人
观察者；看守人；哨兵；（美）选举监票员
